attributes.action: ensure that children of donor conception do not have to under go the indignity of having their conception details for all to see on birth certificates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
please ensure that children of donor conception do not have to under go the indignity of having their conception details for all to see on birth certificates these details should be kept Private and left for the children and their family's to decide who knows them.
i do strongley belive in the child having a right to know how they were conceived but if put on birth certificates it will breach the child's human rights by showing parties such as banks,passport offices, schools,and other such organisations that dont need to know details that may lead to distress for the children concerned
